| HistoryText             = 
===Overview===
The '''New York Yankees''' are an [[American]] professional baseball team based in the [[New York City]] borough of the [[Bronx]]. The Yankees compete in Major League Baseball. They are one of two major league clubs based in New York City, the other being the [[New York Mets (Earth-616)|New York Mets]] of the National League. 

===Events===
In 1942 [[Fred Davis Jr. (Earth-616)|Fred Davis]] was a bat-boy for the New York Yankees.{{r|Marvel Premiere #30}}
